data.text: Tie asɛm yi, mo Israelfo, saa adwotwa yi fa mo ho:
“Ɔbabun Israel ahwe ase
Nea Otumfo Awurade se ni:
Nea Awurade ka kyerɛ Israelfo ni:
Monnhwehwɛ Bet-El,
Monhwehwɛ Awurade na munnya nkwa,
Mo a moma atemmu yɛ nwen
Nea ɔbɔɔ nsoromma, Akokɔbeatan ne ne mma,
Ɔsɛe abandennen ntɛm so
motan nea ɔteɛteɛ wɔ asennii
Mutiatia ohiani so
Na minim mo mmarato dodow
Ɛno nti, onyansafo yɛ komm saa mmere yi mu,
Monhwehwɛ papa, na moanya nkwa
Munkyi bɔne, na monnɔ papa;
Enti nea Awurade, Asafo Awurade Nyankopɔn se ni:
Wobetwa adwo wɔ bobeturo nyinaa mu,
Nnome nka wɔn a
Ɛbɛyɛ te sɛ onipa a oguan fi gyata anim
Na Awurade da no bɛyɛ sum; ɛrenyɛ hann,
“Mikyi na mepo mo nyamesom mu aponto;
Ɛwɔ mu sɛ mode ɔhyew afɔre ne aduan afɔre brɛ me de,
Momfa mo nnwonto gyegyeegye no mfi me so!
Mmom, momma atɛntrenee nteɛ sɛ asubɔnten,
“Israelfo, ɛnyɛ me na mode afɔrebɔde ne ayɛyɛde brɛɛ me
Mode mo ho nyinaa ato Molok nyame,
Ɛno nti, metwa mo asu akɔ Damasko nohɔ,”
